page.title: 18SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: {Food}shops.Out of 29 families questioned,28 said they shop for food in{Loughborough.}Here are the shops that the 29 families said they used {Sainsburys 10,Presto 2,Tesco {1,Kwiksave 1,Safeway 1}and{12 families shopped for food from several shops.{Clothes}shops.We asked this question,"Does your family buy clothes mostly in Loughborough?" 10 said "yes" 18 said "no".12 families bought their clothes from{Nottingham}and 9 said they bought their clothes from Leicester 6 families said they ordered their clothes from catalogues.Shoes. 24 families bought{shoes}in Loughborough but 5 did not.We asked what shops people would like to see in Loughborough.17 would like to see {Marks and Spencers,7 C and A,7 British {Home Stores,4 Little Woods.5}would like to see a department store.
